Class FontDefinition

java.lang.Object
uk.co.spudsoft.xlsx.FontDefinition
public class FontDefinition extends Object
Details of the font to use. If the font name is not recognised Excel will keep the unknown value but seems to render it as Calibri.
Author:
jtalbut
